**Tender Summary**
----------------
The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting bidding for a contract to supply 472 Rotary Chairs for various sites within the National Capital Region (NCR). The procurement method is competitive with open bidding, and the selection criteria are based on the lowest price.

**Scope of Work**
----------------
The requirements include the delivery of 472 Rotary Chairs to the designated sites within the NCR. The scope of work will encompass the fulfillment of the procurement contract clauses and the terms and conditions as outlined in the request for proposal (RFP) document.
